createCourt.title: Add New Court
createCourt.customHelp: Enter duration in minutes (e.g., 15, 180) or with "min" suffix (e.g., 15min, 180min)

pricingMode.basicDesc: Single price for all time slots

createCourt.pricePerSlotHelp: This price applies to all selected time slots. The price you enter is the price for the duration of each time slot (e.g., if you set €25 and have 60min slots, each 60min booking costs €25).
createCourt.advancedPricingHelp: Set different prices for different time periods. The price you enter applies to each time slot booking during that time period.
createCourt.advancedPricingNote: Note: If no advanced pricing tiers are enabled, the basic price will be used for all time periods.
createCourt.isActiveLabel: Court is active and available for booking

hero.title: Partner with Playmaker
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform to manage, automate, and grow your sports facility business.

section1.title: Easy Facility Management
section1.description: Manage your facilities, bookings, and customers all in one place with our intuitive platform.

section2.title: Automated Booking System
section2.description: Let customers book your facilities 24/7 with our automated booking system that handles payments and confirmations.

section3.title: Analytics & Insights
section3.description: Track your performance with detailed analytics and insights to optimize your facility utilization.

analytics.title: Data-Driven Decisions
analytics.subtitle: Turn data into revenue
analytics.description: Stop guessing. Know exactly when your peak hours are, which courts generate the most revenue, and track growth over time. Our analytics dashboard provides actionable insights to help you optimize pricing and availability.

seasonal.title: Seasonal & Recurring Bookings
seasonal.subtitle: Simplify long-term scheduling
seasonal.description: Easily manage league games, training sessions, and long-term rentals. Our seasonal booking engine handles conflicts, automated renewals, and bulk invoicing effortlessly.

marketing.title: Promotions & Growth
marketing.subtitle: Fill empty slots fast
marketing.description: Attract new customers and fill off-peak hours with flexible promotion tools. Create time-limited offers, first-time customer discounts, and targeted campaigns.

comparison.title: Why Choose Playmaker?
comparison.subtitle: See how we stack up against the competition

testimonials.title: Trusted by Facility Owners
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of facilities scaling with Playmaker

t1.text: Playmaker transformed how we manage our tennis courts. The seasonal booking feature alone saved us hours of admin work every week.
t1.author: Jane Doe

t2.text: The analytics dashboard gives us insights we never had before. We've increased revenue by 15% just by optimizing our peak hours based on the data.
t2.author: John Smith

t3.text: Finally, a system that handles both our daily bookings and our complex league schedules without crashing. Support is outstanding.
t3.author: Mike Johnson

video.title: See Playmaker in Action
video.subtitle: Watch how easy it is to manage your facility

testimonials.title: What Players Say

t1.text: Finally, a platform where I can find and book tennis courts without calling 5 different places. Saved me so much time!
t1.author: Marko K.

t2.text: I discovered new padel courts near me that I didn't even know existed. The booking process is super smooth.
t2.author: Ana J.

t3.text: Great for organizing weekly football with friends. We always find available pitches, even on weekends.
t3.author: Tomaž N.
